content: but do not worry if there is a one or two stitch difference you will now be back at needle 1 with 20 22 heel sts + 17 19 1st flap sts on needle 1 and 32 36 instep sts + 17 19 2nd flap sts from the other flap on needle 2 this is the beginning of your rounds for the gusset hint put a removable stitch marker at the beginning of the round at the start of the heel stitches to remind you round 1 needle 1 knit across heel sts and flap sts till last 3 sts on the needle then k2tog k1 needle 2 knit or pattern across the instep sts sm k1 ssk knit the rest of the flap sts on the needle 2 sts decr in the round round 2 knit or pattern all sts on both needles sm after the instep as you go repeat rounds 1 & 2 until you have 6 7 sts remaining after the marker you may need to do an extra round decr for one side of the flap if your numbers differ you will now have 64 72 sts in total 20 22 heel sts + 12 14 flap sts 6 7 from each needle + 32 36 instep sts this is your magic number 64 72 sts again hints for calculations in the future 1 to calculate how many sts you need to reduce for the gusset original number of sts minus instep sts minus heel sts = x divide x by 2 to get the number which should remain after the marker and after the heel sts on needle 1 after decreases 2 you can also start the gusset with one row tidying up the numbers knit or pattern instep sts decr by k2tog or ssk in the corner between the picked up flap sts and the instep sts so that you have the same number of sts for each flap 3 any pattern continues on the instep or top of the foot sts only the sole sts are knit only 4 foot re-arrange sts for knitting the foot round 1 needle 1 knit 26 29 sts of heel and flap on the needle needle 2 knit or pattern instep 32 36 sts up to the stitch marker next carefully shift the last 6 7 flap sts after the marker on needle 2 onto needle 1 knit across the rest of the sts on needle 1 removing any markers as you go you will now have 32 36 sts on each needle and the start of your work becomes the instep or top of the foot sts with the heel and all flap sts the sole sts on the second needle 64 72 sts in total place the removable stitch marker to mark the new start of the round at the beginning of the instep stitches which are now on needle 1 knit or pattern every round until the foot is approx 4 5 cm
